newsitem.title: SWEDEN: Moody's says confirms Enso Oy longterm Baa2 rating.
newsitem.headline: Moody's says confirms Enso Oy longterm Baa2 rating.

text.p: U.S. credit ratings agency Moody's said on Wednesday it confirmed the longterm Baa2 rating of Finnish forestry group Enso Oy.
Moody's said Enso Oy had been under review after acquiring a majority stake in German paper maker E. Holtzmann & Cie AG.

"The debt-financed acquisition of the German newsprint and magazine paper manufacturer should place only modest near term additional strain on Enso's debt protection measurements as Enso will cut back on other investments," a Moody's statement said.
"The combined operations will likely produce some meaningful synergistic benefits."
Moody's said the acquisition would bolster Enso's position in the German publication papers market.
